summary.para: Creates a new instance of the default proxy locator.

param.name: ppProxyLocator
param.para: Receives a pointer to the new proxy locator object's interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

param.name: pszHost
param.para: Null-terminated wide-character string containing the hostname of the destination server.

param.name: pszUrl
param.para: Null-terminated wide-character string containing the destination URL.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Determines the next proxy to use.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: There are no more proxy objects.

summary.para: Retrieves the current proxy information including hostname and port.

param.name: pszStr
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that receives a null-terminated string containing the proxy hostname and port. This parameter can be NULL.

param.name: pcchStr
param.para: On input, specifies the number of elements in the pszStr array. On output, receives the required size of the buffer.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The buffer specified in pszStr is too small.

summary.para: Keeps a record of the success or failure of using the current proxy.

param.name: hrOp
param.para: HRESULT specifying the result of using the current proxy for connection.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Determines the proxy to use when connecting to a server. The network source uses this interface.

Applications can create the proxy locator configured by the application by implementing the interface and setting the MFNETSOURCE_PROXYLOCATORFACTORY property on the source resolver. Otherwise, the network source uses the default Media Foundation implementation.
To create the default proxy locator, call .
